casebody.data:
EHMANN, et al.
v.
MEDFLOW, INC., et al. 433A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2017 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Medflow, Inc., et al. Harold C. Spears, Attorney at Law, Christopher P. Raab, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Ehmann, Eugene K., et al.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of December 2017 by Defendants (Medflow, Inc. and Medflow Holdings, LLC) for Extension of Time to Serve Objections and Amendments to the Proposed Record on Appeal: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2017." Jackson, J. recused
